name: The Scorpions Insurgency
startIntroPart1: 'The insurgency will always prevail.' - Trevor W. William
startIntroPart2: This is based on my original creation, so this is only just for fun.
declaringWar: I've had enough of this! Prepare to feel the wrath of The Scorpions Insurgency!
attacked: You fool, do you really think you can defeat us? Just so you know, we will raze you and your nation to the ground!
defeated: You may have won this war. But soon, the Scorpions Insurgency will rise again, and your nation will burn to ashes
introduction: I am Trevor William, I lead the fearsome Scorpions Insurgency. Now I would have destroy you, but I will spare you for now.
neutralLetsHearIt: Go on, I don't have all day.
neutralNo: Don't make a fool out of yourself.
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
